results.title: Metformin alters skeletal muscle transcriptome adaptations to resistance training in older adults
results.text_hl: We suggest that although @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may blunt pathways induced by PRT to promote @<m>DISEASE_Myostatin_related_muscle_hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536106 @@@muscle hypertrophy@@@, adjunctive @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ during PRT may have beneficial effects on aging-associated pathways in muscle from older adults.

citations.NLM: Kulkarni AS, Peck BD, Walton RG, Kern PA, Mar JC, Windham ST, Bamman MM, Barzilai N, Peterson CA. Metformin alters skeletal muscle transcriptome adaptations to resistance training in older adults Aging (Albany NY). 2020 Oct 18;12(20):19852-19866. PMID: 33071237
citations.BibTeX: @article{33071237, title={Metformin alters skeletal muscle transcriptome adaptations to resistance training in older adults}, author={Kulkarni AS and Peck BD and Walton RG and Kern PA and Mar JC and Windham ST and Bamman MM and Barzilai N and Peterson CA}, journal={Aging (Albany NY)}, volume={12}, number={20}, pages={19852-19866}}

results.title: Metformin ablates high fat diet-induced skeletal muscle hypertrophy and elevation of sarcolemmal GLUT4 when feeding is initiated in young adult male mice.
results.text_hl: HFD-induced @<m>DISEASE_Myostatin_related_muscle_hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536106 @@@muscle hypertrophy@@@ and elevated membrane @GENE_SLC2A4 @GENE_6517 @@@GLUT4@@@ were unexpectedly attenuated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Lawler JM, Kamal KY, Botchlett RE, Woo SL, Li H, Hord JM, Fluckey JD, Wu C. Metformin ablates high fat diet-induced skeletal muscle hypertrophy and elevation of sarcolemmal GLUT4 when feeding is initiated in young adult male mice. Connect Tissue Res. 2025 Mar 7;():1-15. PMID: 40052722

results.title: Metformin Ameliorates Inflammation and Airway Remodeling of Experimental Allergic Asthma in Mice by Restoring AMPKalpha Activity
results.text_hl: By histopathological and immunohistochemical analyses, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ showed a significant alleviation in @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@airway inflammation@@@, and in the parameters of airway remodeling including goblet @DISEASE_Hyperplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@cell hyperplasia@@@, collagen deposition and airway @<m>DISEASE_Myostatin_related_muscle_hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536106 @@@smooth muscle hypertrophy@@@ compared to those in the @GENE_SERPINB1_PS1 @GENE_282665 @@@OVA@@@-challenged @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Ma W, Jin Q, Guo H, Han X, Xu L, Lu S, Wu C. Metformin Ameliorates Inflammation and Airway Remodeling of Experimental Allergic Asthma in Mice by Restoring AMPKalpha Activity Front Pharmacol. 2022;13():780148. PMID: 35153777

results.title: Metformin blunts muscle hypertrophy in response to progressive resistance exercise training in older adults: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, multicenter trial: The MASTERS trial
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ blunts @<m>DISEASE_Myostatin_related_muscle_hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536106 @@@muscle hypertrophy@@@ in response to progressive resistance exercise training in older adults: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, multicenter trial: The MASTERS trial
